common_filenames.description: Quicken Data.qdfm - Default filename given to QDFM files.

detailed_instructions: You can only open a QDFM file with Quicken 2007 or later for Mac. To open the QDFM file, select File â†’ New , then select "Start from a Quicken 2007 data file" on the "Getting Started" page.
